resources.string: Tom is a 7-year-old boy with striking yellow eyes. He has a blonde hair and is known for his hobby of chasing Jerry, his mischievous brother. His favorite drink is milk, and he can't resist a delicious plate of cookies.

Jerry is a 5-year-old boy with bright black eyes. He has brunette hair. His favorite pastime is outsmarting Tom in various comical ways. When it comes to refreshments, he prefers a sip of water and indulges in mouthwatering cheese.
Spike is a light brown boy with brown eyes. He is 9 years old and has a brown hair. His favorite pastime is sleeping, and he enjoys bone broth and bones as his favorite food.
